amazons.algorithms.mcts.node package¶

Submodules¶

amazons.algorithms.mcts.node.node module¶

class amazons.algorithms.mcts.node.node.Node(state, action, player)¶

Bases: ABC

Abstract class to represent a Node for the MCTS algorithms

Attributes:

state: board state of the node action: action that the node represents player: player for the state of the node parent: parent node children: list of child nodes

Author: Gonzalo Rodríguez Rodríguez

abstract expand()¶

Expands the node, obtaining the child nodes of the current node :return: None

amazons.algorithms.mcts.node.node_epsilon module¶

class amazons.algorithms.mcts.node.node_epsilon.NodeEpsilon(state, action, player)¶

Bases: Node

Class to represent a Node for the MCTS Epsilon-Greedy algorithm

Attributes:

n: number of visits to the node Q: action value estimate

Author: Gonzalo Rodríguez Rodríguez

expand()¶

Expands the node, obtaining the child nodes of the current node :return: None
